gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Wizards 132, Hornets 116
gameRecap.excerpt: The Wizards defeated the Hornets, 132-116. Kyle Kuzma led the way for the Wizards with 33 points, nine rebounds, and four assists, while LaMelo Ball tallied a game-high 34 points, along with four rebounds, and seven assists for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Wizards improve to 2-5 on the season, while the Hornets fall to 2-5.
